tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE TraineeFeedback (
  feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  trainee_id INT,
  feedback_text TEXT,
  rating INT,
  feedback_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE feedback (
  feedback_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  trainee_id INT NOT NULL,
  feedback_text TEXT,
  rating INT,
  feedback_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE training_experience (
  experience_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  trainee_id INT,
  training_duration TIME,
  completed BOOLEAN,
  feedback_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE Feedback (
    feedback_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    session_id UUID,
    trainee_id UUID,
    rating INT,
    comments TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Reviews (
    review_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    feedback_id UUID,
    reviewer_name VARCHAR(255),
    review_date TIMESTAMP,
    review_comments TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE feedback (
  feedback_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  trainee_id INT,
  feedback_text TEXT,
  rating INT,
  submitted_at TIMESTAMP
);
